items.title: Dividend Hikes Offer Optimism Amid Tariff Turmoil
items.description: We profile a pair of blue chips that recently announced dividend hikes, which has turned out to be a broader Q2 theme

items.title: US States Likely to Defy US Downgrade to Keep Top Credit Ratings
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- US states from Florida to North Carolina and Texas would likely hold onto top-notch credit scores from Moody’s Ratings, mostly because they’re in better fiscal shape than the federal government itself.
